properties.entry: Ship arrived from Europe and waiting for next command.
Famine plague colony %s. Colonists are dying.
Famine is coming in colony %s. in next turn colonist will die.
Because of religion unrest in Europe new colonist decide to emigrate. Now is waiting in Europe.
There is a new unit in colony.
%s of %s goods was throws away because there is no space left in colony %s warehouse.
